sqlMap.insert: insert into web_posts (post_no, post_title, post_user_id, post_content) values (WEB_POSTS_SEQ.nextval, #title#, #userId#, #content#)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from web_posts where post_deleted = 'N'

select P.post_no as no, P.post_title as title, P.post_user_id as userId, U.user_name as userName, P.post_read_count as readCount, P.post_comment_count as commentCount, P.post_created_date as createdDate from (select row_number() over (order by post_no desc) row_numbers, post_no, post_title, post_user_id, post_read_count, post_comment_count, post_created_date from web_posts where post_deleted = 'N') P, web_users U where P.post_user_id = U.user_id and P.row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select post_no as no, post_title as title, post_user_id as userId, post_content as content, post_deleted as deleted, post_read_count as readCount, post_comment_count as commentCount, post_created_date as createdDate, post_updated_date as updatedDate from web_posts where post_no = #value# and post_deleted = 'N'

select P.post_no as no, P.post_title as title, P.post_user_id as userId, U.user_name as userName, P.post_content as content, P.post_read_count as readCount, P.post_comment_count as commentCount, P.post_created_date as createdDate, P.post_updated_date as updatedDate from web_posts P, web_users U where P.post_user_id = U.user_id and P.post_no = #value#
sqlMap.update: update web_posts set post_title = #title#, post_content = #content#, post_read_count = #readCount#, post_comment_count = #commentCount#, post_deleted = #deleted#, post_updated_date = sysdate where post_no = #no#
